text: Erazo is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Álex Erazo (born 1980), Salvadoran footballer *Carlos Alberto Madero Erazo, Honduran minister *Frickson Erazo (born 1988), Ecuadorian footballer *Guillermo Ayoví Erazo (born 1930), Ecuadorian musician, singer and marimba player *Nelson Erazo (athlete) (1959-2017), Puerto Rican track and field athlete *Rodolfo Erazo (born 1946), Honduran long-distance runner
title: Erazo
